articles.author: Sarah Elbeshbishi
articles.title: Russian judge rules American journalist Evan Gershkovich to remain in jail on spying charges - USA TODAY
articles.description: The detention of Evan Gershkovich marks the first time an American journalist has been arrested on espionage charges since the Cold War.
articles.content: A Russian judge upheld the detention of American journalist Evan Gershkovich on Tuesday following his arrest on spying charges amid the Kremlins sweeping crackdown on press freedom during the war in … [+2557 chars]
